MGZ 2021
==================

Under *MGZ 2021*, *punctilious* formalizes the theories described in :cite:`mgz_2021_introductionprooftheory{An Introduction to Proof Theory: Normalization, Cut-Elimination, and Consistency Proofs}` .

One :ref:`theory-elaboration-sequence<theory_elaboration_sequence_math_concept>` is provided per key section or chapter in the original book.

.. toctree::
   :titlesonly:
   :caption: Book chapters

   2.4.1: Minimal logic<mgz_2021/minimal_logic_m0>
   2.4.2: Intuitionistic logic<mgz_2021/intuitionistic_logic_j0>
   2.4.3: Classical logic<mgz_2021/classical_logic_k0>
